about_the_game:
This is the demo version, which will not be released system heros after 191 years, and will disable equipment and marriage

The Sanguos2 is a simple single-player strategy game that pays attention to the functional experience of the game without fancy special effects, such as video.

It was an original game that took a single person 10 months to complete.
Game design, numerical, art and programming are all done by one person, and sound effects are purchased at a low cost.
So you might think the art is crude and the sound effects are not shocking.
But the game is not simple, with combat, equipment, digging corner, market, marriage, stratagem and other functions, a total of 45 cities and 525 system heros, marriage can also produce new heros.

If you want to play a fast game, just focus on the employ and equipment, automatic task can automatically supplement troops and develop internal affairs, and you can also triple the speed of automatic combat.
